channel.title: Guides on Mike Vu
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Mike Vu

item.title: How to Create an S3 Bucket in AWS Using Terraform
item.description: Save AWS Access Keys for Terraform Admin Account # Create an AWS credentials file so that Terraform can get the programmatic credentials for the AWS administrator pushing configs via Terraform.

item.title: Using Python to Convert Meraki MX Firewall Rules into JSON and CSV Files
item.description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of using Python to download the Layer 3 and Layer 7 rules from a Meraki MX into a CSV spreadsheet.

item.title: How to Configure AzureAD SAML Authentication for AnyConnect VPN on Meraki
item.description: Configuration steps on AzureAD and Meraki Dashboards # This guide seems redundant, but there are some quirks that are not accounted for in the official Meraki documentation.
